评论详情: I LOVE THESE HOODIES! i loved the first one so much, I ordered the other 2 colors. Very soft, warm and comfortable. Not heavy. True to size.
Looks great, great fit and soft and comfortable !!

the sweatshirt is made of thick material and sewn well. longer length and pockets are a plus. Great for cold weather. Why the low rating? the hood is poorly designed. It is way too bulky so instead of laying on the shoulder, acts more like a cape. I had ordered two. I opened and washed one hoping it would soften but no difference. So now keeping that for yard work in cold weather and returning the other. If you don't mind the bulk, it's a great product.

Very cute, comfy & oversized fit. I got a medium and it’s perfect for the fit style. But if you’re wanting something more form fitting, definitely size down. But I love the oversized fit. Definitely getting more colors.
Zipper quality is good, sleeve length is good.  It is soft and flattering.

评论概述: The red sweater Was really a hit
评论详情: My granddaughter really loves her sweater. She liked the color and it fit her really good. She was satisfied with it.
Best quality. So nice and exactly as described. Great value for money I do not want to ever take it off!

评论概述: Great deal a must buy it item !!!
评论详情: Love this hoodie definitely my favorite. I have since bought several more from this seller and love them all sizing and colors are always as advertised the quality and styles are better than expected
I know it’s oversized, but XS fit me like a medium/large. I am usually a size small so i got it a bit smaller. I ended up giving it to my mom. It fits her perfectly with little oversized look.
Warm, soft, fleece lined, generous size hoody. Comfortable not tight. Could live in this 24/7. Bright white

I blindly purchased two colors after reading the reviews. They did not disappoint! The quality for the price is shocking considering the price of clothes nowadays, it’s the exact thicker material I was looking for. Neck hole is perfect not too tight like most unisex hoodies. Order your true size, they already are over size plenty. I already want another color lol
I like this. It’s soft and warm. Heavyweight. Oversized.  Very comfortable.

It's SO comfortable and the fit is perfect and true to size (I'm a size L and ordered an L). It's oversized but the arms and length are still correct. The only reason why I gave it 4 stars is because the hood is a bit too heavy, almost uncomfortable. It's nice since it's so structured but it feels kinda irritating when it's down unless you pull the neck forward.

评论概述: Get this is you want fuzz all over everything in your life.
评论详情: I love the weight of this hoodie, the XL was oversized for me, the color was great, but I wore it once and there was fuzz ALL over my black pants. So I washed it. Terrible idea. I couldn’t believe all the lint/fuzz. I spent a lot of time getting it all off and washed it again? More fuzz. I’m not going to spend an hour removing this fuzz each time until the hoodie disintegrates away 😂 This thing is a mess.
favorite hoodie. Super awesome quality, thick and I love that. It doesn’t have a drawstring.
so so cute!! does shed little bit but nothing crazy. Im 5'4 and 138 ish and got a medium, but a small would have fit too. color Is perfect.

Heavy material, good length sleeve and nice sized heavy hood. Leaves a lot of fuzzies behind but the warmth is worth it. In a medium, definitely oversized, but the bottom band isn’t overly stretched, which is nice. I feel like a pink marshmallow, in the best way. Perfect for leggings
So comfy and great material!
this is the perfect lounge sweatshirt. soft, comfy, perfectly oversized. will be buying in other colors!
I returned it.

I ordered this to wear on a flight to Toyko.  It is best to have a hood so it helps with sleeping.  I wanted something soft, comfortable and oversized.  I am 5'4" and 180lbs--the XL is very oversized and perfect.  I want to order in many more colors.  I will be cozy on my flight.

Comfy! Oversized! And thick! Obsessed! I am 6’4 180lb bought myself a Large light grey and it fits great, arm length is awesome as well! My husband is 6’5 285lb and I bought him a 4X light grey and he is obsessed with how cozy the hoodie is and the great material! We like them so much we ordered the light brown ones to match with as well
Very nicely made. So warm and cozy.
This was cute until I washed it. Unfortunately it shrinks.
It is super soft and comfortable
Sweatshirt came with a large stain
thick and doesnt collect lint or anything like that. its nice and baggy but not too baggy. good for short girls
Love having the option of wearing an oversized hoodie among my sweatshirts.
My 16 year old daughter was super excited with this. She didn’t even pick it out. Her mom did. Great find. Wish they had more colors
Very nice oversized sweatshirt, warm, comes out of the laundry perfectly. Nice heavy material with frog front pocket
Love love loveeeee this sweatshirt. It's so comfy and great quality. I ordered my normal size and could have sized down. Highly recommend.
It pilled after a couple washes

I have a long torso, apple shaped, and short legs and arms. I usually wear XXL and bought the recommended XL. I LOVE the sweater and it is plenty big enough, just wish it were a bit longer. It’s so soft, warm, and cozy. It’s made really well. I know it will wash well too, probably will have extra lent, and it should probably be washed before worn if you don’t want fuzzies on your shirt.
It washes fine, and is very comfortable. I ordered an XL and didn’t feel super oversized. My only complaint is it didn’t feel like a crispy brand new sweatshirt or look like one

评论概述: Oversized perfectly! But the hood is huge
评论详情: Love the sizing. I wanted a sweatshirt relaxed in the chest and shoulders so oversized a couple sizes down from my usual is perfect. Normally an XL went with a medium to get the relaxed shoulders but keeping the stomach lightly loose. The only thing I’m not wild about it the hood. It’s also quite oversized making it heavy so I have to pull down the front regularly to avoid too much pressure on my throat. Otherwise, wonderful and great thick material with some breathability.
I ordered the “fiery red” sweatshirt but it came as more a a bright red rather than the darker red shown. Other than that, the material is good and comfy.

评论概述: Warm and toasty but full of lint…
评论详情: I bought 2 of these and they are very warm and cozy.  However, the lining is full of lint balls.  Pictured is the shirt I wore under the sweatshirt.  I intend to wash without anything else in the bowl so that the lint does not spread to my other things.  Hopefully, one washing will fix the problem.
Really love this sweatshirt.  It's oversized, warm and comfy.  I am going to order more.
Thick, great quality.  Nice colors
It’s giving cutesy girl in her boyfriend’s hoodie
I love this hoodie so much, it’s so big and comfy and keeps you nice and warm 😊10 outta 10 would recommend

评论概述: So good my son thinks it’s the more expensive brand
评论详情: My 10 year old son calls this my Comft hoodie. It’s seriously so good he thinks it’s one of those. It’s so comfy and really does look like one of the trendy ones. Size is perfect. Washed it a few times now and it’s still soft and comfy. Want every color now!

Purchased a medium - 5'4" 155lbs, the fit is moderate and the length covers my bum perfectly, for an exaggerated oversized look, I should have sized up.  I will most likely purchase in more colors as the product washes well and it is the legitamately a great hoodie.
It's a nice hoodie but the price is too high for product received.
This hoodie felt SO cheap. Very thin. Not soft at all. Walmart is better quality than this.
The quality of this hoodie is amazing, and the color is gorgeous and vibrant. One of my favorite purchases from Amazon tbh
Like everything about it's roomy to
I read people's reviews and those who said to get your regular size were not lying!! I am a size medium who purchased a size medium & it is oversized. I do not regret my decision<3
Love the thickness of this hoodie. The fit is amazing and I want to wear it every day! Want one in each color!!

评论概述: I wear a large and purchase a medium
评论详情: This hoodie was still huge wow.
Perfect amount of oversize and looks exactly like the photo. Love the pink color!
Comfy, fit is good but the hood is oversized, stiff and bulky
Love it
This fit exactly like I expected. Comfy and roomy.  Looks great with leggings and covers the tush. I am 5’3” and bought a small. I bought two more since I love the fit and comfort so much.

I’m 5’8, long torso, 180 lbs. I will always get the oversized shirts and hoodies from now on. Tip, if you don’t want to be drowning in it. Size down. I usually get large. But for this I got a medium and it was perfect!  Still lots of room and comfortable. But the fuzzies that come off the inside are pretty horrible at first. I’ve washed it 3 times and it’s getting better each time.  It’s a warm thick hoodie. Nice for when not wanting to wear a coat.
Very comfy hoodie that I’m already obsessed with wearing!
Nice and warm

My husband bought me for Christmas. It is SO warm. I am always cold, I usually bundle up in the morning next to the heater to drink my coffee. I can put this on and actually need to take it off in an hour or so because I get hot. I love that it doesn't have strings on the hood. Again, SO warm, will be my winter staple. True to size, 2XL and fits perfect. I have already asked my husband for another.

It’s soft, it’s cozy, it’s warm. Great product! Material is what you’d expect for a sweatshirt not like some I’ve previously purchased that has a different type of material…it’s not bad but I prefer the original type.

This is a great basic for colder temps. It’s true to size it does fit oversized. It’s good quality, soft on the inside. I got the gray and I love it. I’ve washed it multiple times and it looks brand new still. it hasn’t shrunk in the dryer.
Well made, thick and very warm.

评论概述: My go to for travel and flying.
评论详情: So soft!!! Excellent quality and fits true to size. Didn’t shrink after washing & drying. Great value for the price. Will order more in different colors.
Runs big

THIS SWEATSHIRT IS MADE OF EXCELLENT QUALITY FABRIC!  THE FIERY RED COLOR I ORDERED IS VIBRANT; THE FABRIC IS EXTRA THICK & SUPER WARM; THE FIT IS PERFECT, A LITTLE OVERSIZED AS I AM 5'0 & 155# & I ORDERED A LARGE.
i love this hoodie it’s so cute and comfy , such good quality too def worth it. i would size down from ur normal size cause it is bigger

Beautiful sweatshirt, bit of weight to it, well made, very soft, bit oversized, so TTS is perfect. Only reason returning it is the color was more a bright red, touch of coral, than a deep blue red that it looked like in the picture. In the picture I included, my red scrub top is to the right, the darker of the two. Might try a different color, because it really is a good quality hoodie.
I live in this hoodie now. It's so soft and comfortable. I sized up so it'd be more oversized and I love it.
This is my favorite clothing item now. It’s the perfect hoodie and looks so good, definitely a staple. Has the perfect oversized fit. Just ordered another color!

I usually don’t leave reviews but this is the best hoodie ever. So nice and heavy, literally wear it everywhere. I am 5’9 130 lbs and got a M. Perfect oversized fit without being too big. Def wash before because they come vacuum sealed and smell a bit like the plastic.
Showed up with no tags and absolutely filthy, definitely used!
Product was comfortable and fits true to size.  Quality is great and holds up well in the washer and dryer. Color was accurate to description.

评论概述: Fabric is no good Hot stuffy no breathability
评论详情: Had high hopes for this, bought because of reduced price, but the fabric was terrible.  It doesn’t feel good on, it’s stuffy and hot, no breathability, says 50 cotton 50 polyester, I have other things that are actually that… this feels like all polyester or a mix of recycled plastic and polyester.  The sizing and fit overall was just ok, too tight in the neck area.  Just felt stuffy and hot.  Not a fan of this at all. If I’m paying 40 dollars for a sweatshirt, it needs to feel good on and be a nice fit!  This missed the mark.
So comfortable.  The hood protects my neck from drafts. I like no strings because they won’t tangle. Also the front pocket is perfect in size, and large enough for both hands at same time.  Perfect!

评论概述: Great if you’re looking for a straight jacket
评论详情: If you want a hoodie with no stretch at all, look no further. This is one hoodie that will ensure that you are uncomfortable at all times.

评论概述: It’s not as oversized as it looks
评论详情: I bought a 2xl because that’s what the charts said and was recommended. Fit like a regular hoodie. I bought a 4xl, not as lengthy as I wanted. Still a soft comfy hoodie, just not what I was going for.
SO comfy and soft, fits perfectly at arms and is just the perfect amount of oversized to be cute + comfy but not get in the way
Very very roomy - I would even say you could size down. Heavy, quality sweatshirt, tan colored was very true to picture.

评论概述: Passed the test for my daughter!
评论详情: My daughter had on her wish list a hoodie from Abercrombie. They were sold out, and I looked on Amazon, and found this one. Another reviewer had mentioned how similar in quality and softness it was to their Abercrombie one. I took a chance and ordered it and it passed muster! (I've tried this kind of thing in the past and items did not - LOL).  The price is very reasonable and because she likes it, that's why I'm giving it 5 stars!

Plus size shopping is so hit or miss. This hooded sweatshirt checks all the boxes I’m around 5’8 and 280. Length of sweatshirt and sleeves is perfect. It washes nicely and haven’t noticed any pilling or snags. I need one in every color I ordered the 2x.
I love the feel of this sweatshirt, trendy and the perfect oversized, in-style sweatshirt and a great price.

评论概述: Don’t buy !!! black DYE all over my arms !!!
评论详情: I had to scrub my arms and shoulders to get the black dye off after I put this hideous sweatshirt on which I wore for 5 hours !!!! What a waste of money !!!!! Poorly made ; obviously sprayed!!!!!!! Short sleeves /bulky on the top -Started having allergic reaction ….threw it out ! Do not buy !!!!!! How dare they sell this ?

These are very good quality and thick! Don’t know how well they wash up as I just received it. I usually get a small and hoodies, but because of reviews I ordered the extra small. The extra small is still huge! Unfortunately, the color I want does not come in an extra extra small.
Nice sweatshirt and pretty color. Fits well too. But, it's very heavy! You don't need a jacket when you wear this, but it's a little hot when you wear it inside. Definitely an outside sweatshirt!

Love it! Warm, soft, cozy! I ordered the grey coffee- beautiful color. I generally take a small, but ordered this is in a medium because several comments mentioned that the arms run short. I’m glad I did, as I’m almost 5’9 and the arms, indeed run a little short. But because I ordered the medium it works!
Super comfy and the perfect oversize fit

This sweater is so comfortable I absolutely love it! It does run big I got my normal size which is a medium and it’s perfect! I was looking for an oversized hoodie that was soft and beautiful, this one fits perfect.
My daughter ordered the XS and is that too big so we ordered the XXS….. It was bigger than the XS.  Not happy with sizing at all
These sweatshirts are perfect. I love them . I have almost every color .
Oversized sweatshirt. So comfy and warm. You need one!!
This hoodie is soo warm I’m 5’2 and 98lbs and it fits true to size. I got an xxs it fits well :)
I’d like to consider myself a comfy-clothes connoisseur. This hoodie is easily the most quality and comfortable hoodie I own.
Color is beautiful, it’s soft and comfortable. Buy it!
Just like the picture! Soft and good material! TRUE TO SIZE
So comfortable, so soft. The best oversized sweatshirt for lounging around. Super warm too.
Very comfy and warm. Size is true to size
Color is slightly off as described in other reviews but I expected that and was fine with it. Heavy weight and so comfy and warm. Worked great over my 9 month pregnant belly!
Super comfy, flattering and great quality

Already have it in another color! This hoodie is everything I wanted—soft, oversized, and super cozy! Perfect for lounging at home or pairing with leggings for a casual fall or winter look. The fleece is warm without being too heavy, and the fit is just right. I’ve gotten so many compliments already. Definitely adding more colors to my wardrobe!

My daughter loves this sweatshirt! I bought her the pink one and the color is such a pretty bubblegum pink. She’s 5’8, 130 pounds and size M is the perfect oversized fit. I’m pleasantly surprised at the quality too. Very soft and thick material with front pockets. It definitely keeps her warm and she’s already asked if I would order her another color.
I purchased 2 of these and plan to buy more. They are exactly as advertised. Great fit, thick well made and so soft inside. Exactly what I was looking for.
